response.responseTooltip: Introduce yourself to the centaur.

#IF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_kheiron_smalltalk_complete)) You've already spent time making small talk with Kheiron today. You'll have to wait until tomorrow before you can repeat this. #ELSE Spend fifteen minutes talking to Kheiron about the weather, local news, and other such trivial topics. #ENDIF

#IF(game.getCurrentDialogueNode()==DN_innoxia_places_fields_elis_tavern_taur_core_bar_talk_lunette) You're already asking Kheiron what he knows about Lunette! #ELSE Ask Kheiron what he knows about Lunette. #ENDIF

#IF(game.getCurrentDialogueNode()==DN_innoxia_places_fields_elis_tavern_taur_core_bar_talk_history) You're already asking Kheiron about his history and how he came to own this tavern! #ELSE Ask Kheiron about his history and how he came to own this tavern. #ENDIF

#IF(game.getCurrentDialogueNode()==DN_innoxia_places_fields_elis_tavern_taur_core_bar_talk_fae_silvia) You're already asking Kheiron if he knows Fae and Silvia and what he can tell you about them! #ELSE Ask Kheiron if he knows Fae and Silvia and what he can tell you about them. #ENDIF

#IF(game.getCurrentDialogueNode()==DN_innoxia_places_fields_elis_tavern_taur_core_bar_talk_sterope) You're already asking Kheiron if he knows Sterope and what he can tell you about her! #ELSE Ask Kheiron if he knows Sterope and what he can tell you about her. #ENDIF
Ask Kheiron if he has four large, spare barrels which could be sent to Oglix's tavern.

#IF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_kheiron_talk_golix)) You've already asked Kheiron about his relationship with Golix today. It'd be best not to bring up the subject again until tomorrow at the earliest... #ELSE Ask Kheiron about his relationship with Oglix's elemental, Golix. #ENDIF
Order a glass of water.
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=20) Order a glass of carbonated orange juice. #ELSE You can't afford a glass of carbonated orange juice... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=20) Order a glass of berry-flavoured soda. #ELSE You can't afford a glass of berry-flavoured soda... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=25) Order a glass of carbonated cola. #ELSE You can't afford a glass of carbonated cola... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=30) Order a glass of cold-brew, black coffee. #ELSE You can't afford a glass of cold-brew, black coffee... #ENDIF

#IF(pc.getMoney()>=50) Order a small basket of freshly-baked bread rolls from the 'starters & sides' menu. #ELSE You can't afford a small basket of freshly-baked bread rolls from the 'starters & sides' menu... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=50) Order a serving of mixed nuts from the 'starters & sides' menu. #ELSE You can't afford a serving of mixed nuts from the 'starters & sides' menu... #ENDIF

#IF(pc.getMoney()>=80) Order a serving of meat pâté and crackers from the 'starters & sides' menu. #ELSE You can't afford a serving of meat pâté and crackers from the 'starters & sides' menu... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=80) Order a serving of honey bread from the dessert menu. #ELSE You can't afford a serving of honey bread from the dessert menu... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=80) Order a chocolate brownie from the dessert menu. #ELSE You can't afford a chocolate brownie from the dessert menu... #ENDIF
Order a glass of water.
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=20) Order a glass of carbonated orange juice. #ELSE You can't afford a glass of carbonated orange juice... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=20) Order a glass of berry-flavoured soda. #ELSE You can't afford a glass of berry-flavoured soda... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=25) Order a glass of carbonated cola. #ELSE You can't afford a glass of carbonated cola... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=30) Order a glass of cold-brew, black coffee. #ELSE You can't afford a glass of cold-brew, black coffee... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=40) Order a pint of beer. #ELSE You can't afford a pint of beer... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=40) Order a pint of cider. #ELSE You can't afford a pint of cider... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=40) Order a pint of pear cider, which is commonly known as perry. #ELSE You can't afford a pint of pear cider... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=60) Order a glass of red wine. #ELSE You can't afford a glass of red wine... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=60) Order a glass of white wine. #ELSE You can't afford a glass of white wine... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=100) Order a glass of vodka. #ELSE You can't afford a glass of vodka... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=120) Order a glass of rum. #ELSE You can't afford a glass of rum... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=120) Order a glass of whiskey. #ELSE You can't afford a glass of whiskey... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=160) Order a glass of champagne. #ELSE You can't afford a glass of champagne... #ENDIF

#IF(pc.getMoney()>=50) Order a small basket of freshly-baked bread rolls from the 'starters & sides' menu. #ELSE You can't afford a small basket of freshly-baked bread rolls from the 'starters & sides' menu... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=50) Order a serving of mixed nuts from the 'starters & sides' menu. #ELSE You can't afford a serving of mixed nuts from the 'starters & sides' menu... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=50) Order a serving of curly fries from the 'starters & sides' menu. #ELSE You can't afford a serving of curly fries from the 'starters & sides' menu... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=75) Order a serving of shrimp cocktail from the 'starters & sides' menu. #ELSE You can't afford a serving of shrimp cocktail from the 'starters & sides' menu... #ENDIF

#IF(pc.getMoney()>=80) Order a serving of meat pâté and crackers from the 'starters & sides' menu. #ELSE You can't afford a serving of meat pâté and crackers from the 'starters & sides' menu... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=150) Order a serving of fish and chips from the main menu. #ELSE You can't afford a serving of fish and chips from the main menu... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=150) Order a serving of high-quality sausages from the main menu. #ELSE You can't afford a serving of high-quality sausages from the main menu... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=150) Order a burger from the main menu. #ELSE You can't afford a burger from the main menu... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=180) Order a chicken pie from the main menu. #ELSE You can't afford a chicken pie from the main menu... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=250) Order a steak from the main menu. #ELSE You can't afford a steak from the main menu... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=80) Order a fruit salad from the dessert menu. #ELSE You can't afford a fruit salad from the dessert menu... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=80) Order a serving of honey bread from the dessert menu. #ELSE You can't afford a serving of honey bread from the dessert menu... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=80) Order a serving of berry trifle from the dessert menu. #ELSE You can't afford a serving of berry trifle from the dessert menu... #ENDIF
#IF(pc.getMoney()>=80) Order a chocolate brownie from the dessert menu. #ELSE You can't afford a chocolate brownie from the dessert menu... #ENDIF
Just as Golix said, Kheiron is refusing to cooperate, but perhaps the phrase she gave you to use will work...
As you don't know the details about Kheiron's relationship with Golix, it's easy for you to agree to the centaur's terms.
Exit the tavern and head back out into the streets of Elis.

#IF(pc.isAbleToAccessCoverableArea(CA_MOUTH, true)) Approach the table where Fae and Silvia are sitting and say hello. #ELSE You need to be able to access your mouth in order to have fun with Fae and Silvia... #ENDIF
Head on over to Sterope's table and say hello.
As the door is locked, you can't go any further...
Enter the toilets.
Exit the toilets and head back out into the shopping precinct.
Use the toilet.

Use the sinks to wash your [pc.hands] and face.
[style.italicsGood(This will clean all inventory slots associated with head and hand slots, as well as any clothing worn in these slots.)]
response.effects: [#pc.applyLimitedWash(IS_HEAD, IS_EYES, IS_MOUTH, IS_NECK, IS_HAIR, IS_FINGER, IS_HAND, IS_WRIST)] [#game.appendToTextStartStringBuilder(game.parseFromFile('txt/places/fields/elis/tavern_taur', 'TOILETS_WASH'))]
